description: Adds or overwrites only the specified tags for the specified resource. When you specify an existing tag key, the value is overwritten with the new value.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to tag.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to the resource. (dict) --- The tag for a resource. The tag key. value (string) --- The tag value.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The status code of the tag resource operation.
